description: SVG icon component for displaying vector icons via SVG path data. Scalable, styleable, and accessible. Commonly used inline with text or as visual indicators.
useCase: Use for UI icons (arrows, checkmarks, menu icons), social media icons, feature indicators, button icons, and decorative vector graphics. Pair with aria-label for accessibility.

class.description: CSS classes for size and color (w-6 h-6, text-blue-500)

automation.semanticRole: Display vector icon as decorative or semantic indicator
automation.note: Icons are non-interactive by themselves. Wrap in Button or Link for clickable icons. Use aria-label on parent for screen readers.
